verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>. For in a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>, and brought to <S%H1820>nought<s%>; for in a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>, and brought to <S%H1820>nought<s%>.

They are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1006>Bayith<s%>, and to <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, to the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, to <S%H1065>weep<s%>: <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>waileth<s%> over <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, and over <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>; on all their <S%H7218>heads<s%> is <S%H7144>baldness<s%>, every <S%H2206>beard<s%> is cut <S%H1438>off<s%>.

In their <S%H2351>streets<s%> they <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>; on their <S%H1406>housetops<s%>, and in their <S%H7339>broad<s%> <S%H3213>places<s%>, every one waileth, <S%H1065>weeping<s%> <S%H3381>abundantly<s%>.

And <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H2199>crieth<s%> <S%H500>out<s%>, and Elealeh; their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> even unto <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>: therefore the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> cry <S%H7321>aloud<s%>; his <S%H5315>soul<s%> trembleth within <S%H3415>him<s%>.

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> crieth <S%H2199>out<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; her <S%H1280>nobles<s%> flee unto <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>, to <S%H5697>Eglath<s%> - <S%H7992>shelishi-yah<s%>: for by the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%> they go <S%H4608>up<s%>; for in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> they raise <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> shall be <S%H4923>desolate<s%>; for the <S%H1877>grass<s%> is withered <S%H3001>away<s%>, the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>faileth<s%>, there is no green <S%H3418>thing<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> they have <S%H6213>gotten<s%>, and that which they have laid <S%H6486>up<s%>, shall they carry <S%H5375>away<s%> over the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6155>willows<s%>.

For the <S%H2201>cry<s%> is gone round <S%H5362>about<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> thereof unto <S%H97>Eglaim<s%>, and the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> thereof unto <S%H879>Beer-elim<s%>.

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>; for I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> upon <S%H1775>Dimon<s%>, a <S%H738>lion<s%> upon them of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> that <S%H6413>escape<s%>, and upon the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%>.
